abstract: A Miami diner that was a pioneer in race relations closes after six decades. After many strike-outs, an entrepreneur hits a $44 million home run. And how Comcast trains its customer service representatives.
snippet: A Miami diner that was a pioneer in race relations closes after six decades. After many strike-outs, an entrepreneur hits a $44 million home run. And how Comcast trains its customer service representatives.
lead_paragraph: What’s affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners today.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: Amazon’s ‘Unbreachable Moat’
